incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: We experienced Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple Twilio services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple Twilio services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT:

-Flex Taskrouter: 5xx errors from TaskRouter APIs
-Flex Proxy: 5xx errors from Proxy APIs
-Flex Application Platform: To be determined
-Studio: Increased latency
-Programmable SMS: Increase in 5xx errors for API requests to send messages
-Programmable Video Recordings: 5xx errors
-Programmable Voice Calls: 5xx errors for Voice APIs
-Programmable Voice Recordings: increased errors when updating recording requests
-Programmable Voice Conferences: inability to add participants to conferences
-Verify: 5xx errors returned from the API

We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT:

-Flex Taskrouter: 5xx errors from TaskRouter APIs
-Flex Proxy: 5xx errors from Proxy APIs
-Flex Application Platform: To be determined
-Studio: Increased latency
-Programmable SMS: Increase in 5xx errors for API requests to send messages
-Programmable Video: Some 5XX errors affecting creation or deletion of video recordings
-Programmable Voice: 5xx errors for kube_namespace:rest-proxy-voice-apis 
-Programmable Voice Recordings: Increased errors when updating recording requests
-Verify: 5xx errors returned from the API

We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Flex Application Platform, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging (SMS Only), Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, Verify, Studio between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Flex Application Platform, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging, Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, Verify, Studio between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging, Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, Verify, and Studio between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging, Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, and Verify between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We experienced issues impacting the Twilio Rest API in the following services: Flex Taskrouter, Lookup, Flex Proxy, Programmable Messaging, Programmable Video, Programmable Voice, and Verify between approximately 10:10 AM PT - 10:20 AM PT. We are continuing to monitor to ensure this issue does not reoccur.  We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery with the Twilio Rest API issue impacting multiple Twilio services. Impact was observed between 10:10 am PT and ended at 10:20 PT approx. We will be monitoring all services to ensure a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing intermittent issues for Messaging, Lookup, Proxy, TaskRouter, and Programmable Voice. We expect to provide another update in 15 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Help Center Assistant API Outage

incident_updates.body: Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. This incident is now resolved

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Help Center Assistant in the the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issues with the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers, requests are failing across all application surfaces and customers are unable to interact with our Help Center Assistant:
- Customers with Free Support plans will be unable to contact support
- Customers with Paid Support will not be able to use the Help Center Assistant, but are unaffected as it relates to contacting support.
- Intelligent Discovery Assistant that is on the Voice and Messaging Insights in the Twilio Console is also impacted
We are currently working to deploy a fix and we expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with the Twilio and SendGrid Help Centers, requests are failing across all application surfaces and customers are unable to interact with our Help Center Assistant:
- Customers with Free Support plans will be unable to contact support
- Customers with Paid Support will not be able to use the Help Center Assistant, but are unaffected as it relates to contacting support.
- Intelligent Discovery Assistant that is on the Voice and Messaging Insights in the Twilio Console is also impacted
We are currently working to deploy a fix and we expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio's AI Assistant. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Lookup V2 reassigned number service affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup product was degraded for 1 minute between 14:04 and 14:05 Pacific Time on 08/27/2025. During this period of time, Lookup returned 38 HTTP 503 errors in a minute for all reassigned_number requests. The issue has now been resolved.

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing voice insights call summaries delays in US1 region. This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to AT&T US via a Subset of Long Code

incident_updates.body: Our engineering team detected a degradation on MMS delivery delays to AT&T US via a Subset of Long Code for 48 minutes between 06:22 and 07:10 Pacific Time on 2025-08-22. During this period of time customers may have experienced MMS delivery delay to AT&T US via a subset of Long Code. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Syriatel in Syria

incident_updates.body:
Our engineers have identified the root cause of the SMS delivery failures to Syriatel in Syria. The carrier has begun enforcing Sender ID registration. This means messages to Syriatel can only be delivered when sent from a registered alphanumeric Sender ID; no other Sender ID types are supported.

Please note that in July 2025, Twilio announced through direct customer communications that SMS delivery to Syria will no longer be supported starting September 15, 2025. Customers were advised to remove Syria traffic from Twilio and transition to alternative messaging providers.

From now until September 15, 2025, SMS delivery to Syriatel in Syria will be on a best-effort basis only. If messages fail, Twilio will not be able to provide troubleshooting support. After September 15, 2025, all messaging traffic to Syria will be blocked.
